title: guruvayurappanE
sahitya:
guruvAyUr appanE appan - shrI krSnan 



(guruvAyUr)







anupallavi







nArAyaNa ena nAvAra azhaippOrkku varumiDar tavirttu



vAncaiyuDan kAkkum 



(guruvAyUr)







caraNam







vizhikaTkamu-dUTTum ezhil tirumEni tazhuvakkaram tuDikkum bAla



tiruvuruvam



muzhumadi mukham tigazh aruL vizhiccuDargaL azhaikkum anbargaLum



aDimalariNaiyum



 (guravAyUr)







madhyamakAlam: munnam yashOdai maindanAi vandavan inru namakkirangi ingu ezhundaruLi



bAlanAi yuvanAi pAlikkum deivamAi paravasha nilai kATTum parama



puruSan en 



(guruvAyUr)
